entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low zero. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers or wet flurries changing to 60 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Saturday 8 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of rain showers or wet flurries. High 10. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of wet flurries changing to 60 percent chance of rain showers in the morning. Wind becoming southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 near noon. High 10. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Saturday 8 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few rain showers or flurries. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: A few rain showers or wet flurries changing to a few flurries near midnight and ending overnight then partly cloudy. Local snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 in the evening then light after midnight. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 5 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Saturday 8 April 2023
